title: New SA Express route to the Eastern Cape
text:
... YOU MIGHT ALSO LIKE {{item.title}}

Travellers now have more options to fly to the Eastern Cape with new routes announced by SA Express on Thursday.

The new routes - effective from 15 November 2019 - will commence between Cape Town and East London (four frequencies per week), East London and Mthatha, and Mthatha and Cape Town (three frequencies per week).

READ: SA Express announces daily flights between Johannesburg and Bulawayo

This is the flight schedule:

SA1361 CPT 06:30 ELS 07:55 (Mon, Wed, Fri, Sun)

SA1377 ELS 08:30 UTT 09:10 (Mon, Fri, Sun)

SA1342 UTT 09:40 CPT 11:30 (Mon, Fri, Sun)

SA1362 ELS 08:30 CPT 10:10 (Wed)
description: SA Express announced that it will commence new routes with flights to East London and Mthahta starting on 15 November 2019.
